summary: An exploration of several interconnected subjects: The Cannes Film Festival, cinema art, money, glamor and death.
cast: James Toback|Alec Baldwin|Jessica Chastain|Bérénice Bejo|Diane Kruger|Neve Campbell|James Caan|Martin Scorsese|Bernardo Bertolucci|Brett Ratner|Roman Polanski|Francis Ford Coppola|Ryan Gosling|Ashok Amritraj|Arpad Busson|Graydon Carter|Michel Ciment|Diablo Cody|Mark Damon|Scott Foundas|Thierry Frémaux|Alan Helene|Larry Herbert|Jeffrey Katzenberg|Charlotte Kirk|Avi Lerner|Todd McCarthy|Mike Medavoy|Ron Meyer|Jean Pigozzi|Denise Rich|Alan Schneider|Ben Schneider|Thorsten Schumacher|Taki Theodoracopulos|Jeremy Thomas|Malya Zaim
title: Seducidos y abandonados
